title: 05/28/21 DPS Hour 1
itunes:title: 05/28/21 DPS Hour 1
description:
In this hour of The Dan Patrick Show, it's reaction time for Dan and company as certain teams look doomed in the NBA playoffs. Also, Dan opines on bad fan behavior at two NBA playoff games already.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
